content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana slovenia the case is about costs and the responsible party is being compensated the procedure started on june 10 2022 and will end on december 22 2022 the final resolution states that the total value of the goods involved is 60000 eur the plaintiff one of the exspouses will receive 30 of the goods while the defendant the other exspouse will receive 70 of the goods the decision was based on a specific law called the civil procedure act section 306 the court settlement is confidential so the details cannot be disclosed there is no translation available for this document
